# sonarr Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "sonarr" {
  url = http://example.sonarr.tv:8989
  api_key = "APIkey-example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **api_key** (String, Sensitive) API key for Sonarr authentication
- **url** (String) Full URL of Sonarr installation
